lookupLabel._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this pipette usage.

coordinatePoint._instruction: Add the central coordinate of the pipette tip.

anatomicalLocation._instruction: Add the anatomical entity in which the pipette tip is located.

pipetteResistance._instruction: Enter the resistance of the pipette used.

pipetteSolution._instruction: Solution used to fill the pipette

startMembranePotential._instruction: Membrane potential of patched cell at the beginning of recording

endMembranePotential._instruction: Membrane potential of patched cell at the end of recording

usedSpecimen._instruction: Add the tissue or subject used with this pipette usage

chlorideReversalPotential._instruction: The chloride reversal potential(s) calculated from the intracellular solution(s) of the pipette(s).

compensationCurrent._instruction: Enter the compensation current for the series resistance.

measuredHoldingPotential._instruction: Enter the measured holding potential of the patched cell

seriesResistance._instruction: Enter the series resistance compensation while patching the cell.

inputResistance._instruction: Enter the input resistance of the patched cell

labelingCompound._instruction: Add the compound used in the pipette to label the cell.
